about_the_game:
As someone who has inherited the power of a mighty necromancer, you must confront the 'Lord of Death' to rescue your trapped companion, venturing through the Tartarus, where the most dangerous monsters and demons are imprisoned. Test your abilities to see if you can survive and reach your destination.

Resurrect Monsters as Champions

You can resurrect monsters with various abilities as Champions, able to summon them at any time. However, each Champion has their own story related to death. Understanding and empathizing with their pain is crucial to becoming a true master.

Summoning and Possession

You can summon Champions to fight alongside you or possess them directly to exploit enemy weaknesses.

Create Your Own Champion

You can customize your own powerful Champions by assembling parts such as heads, bodies, arms, legs, wings, tail and so on, which can be attached to any part of the body or other parts.

Various Weapons and Powerful Necromancy

Necromancers can absorb the life and soul of enemies, and powerful necromancy instills fear in their foes.

The Gate to the Abyss

The Necrostone is a gate that seals the rift leading to the realm of spirits, the Abyss, and has long been strictly controlled by necromancers. However, When the legendary necromancer, 'Gula,' falls into an enemy trap and disappears without a trace, the world plunges into darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 or AMD Ryzen5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB or AMD Radeon RX 560 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700 or AMD Ryzen5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX2060 8GB or AMD 5700 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Embark on an action RPG journey as a necromancer, summoning champions and casting powerful necromancy to defeat wicked spirits. It features sandbox elements allowing you to collect various monsters and craft your own powerful champions by directly disassembling and assembling bodies.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
